thread.title: China’s Reduction of Auto Import Tariffs Steers Asia Stocks Lower

author: Joanne Chiu
title: China’s Reduction of Auto Import Tariffs Steers Asia Stocks Lower

organizations.name: reduction of auto import tariffs steers asia stocks lower asian

text:
Asian stocks were largely lower Wednesday as investors weighed the implications of the latest trade tensions between the U.S. and China, along with the possible cancellation of a June summit between President Donald Trump and North Korea’s Kim Jong Un. Hong Kong and Japan led broader declines, both falling around 1%, while the Shanghai Composite pulled back 0.8% midday.
Concerns about higher oil prices—despite a pullback by Brent crude prices —also weighed on Asian market sentiment. The moves followed a stocks and oil decline...
